Texts.Chs: 我做了一些血液检查，正如我所怀疑的，这不是猫。显然这是一种叫做拉德林的东西？它们看到什么就吃什么，而那些稠密的粘稠物质是液态的。铅。液态铅！难怪她这么重！而且，她显然还是个幼体。她会长大成为... 天啊。
Texts.Eng: I did some Bloogling and as I suspected, this is no cat. Apparently it's a thing called a Radling? They eat everything in sight, and that dense gooey stuff is liquid. Lead. Liquid lead! No wonder she's so heavy! Also, she's apparently a baby. And she'll grow up into... oh god.

Texts.Chs: 刚才我听到有人尖叫。那声音听起来像是鬼画符，而她对此毫不在意。也许还有更多像她一样的东西。
Texts.Eng: I heard some sort of screaming a while ago. It sounded like Squiggles, and she paid no mind to it. Maybe there's more like her out there.

Texts.Chs: 我真的觉得这不是一只猫。
Texts.Eng: I really have a feeling that this isn't a cat.

Texts.Chs: 鬼画符的行为很像猫。当我们抓她的脸颊时，她喜欢喵喵叫，而当她不高兴时，她会咬我们的脚踝。而且，她真的真的很胖。也许她需要节食。当她坐在我腿上的时候，我觉得很不舒服。
Texts.Eng: Squiggles acts a lot like a cat. She likes to meow and coo when we scratch her on the cheek, and she nips our ankles when she's upset. Also, she is REALLY fat. Maybe she needs to go on a diet. It gets uncomfortable when she sits in my lap.

Texts.Chs: 鬼画符跟我们一起上了船。*她什么都吃*。梅普尔仍然崇拜这个小东西，但该死的，如果我们没有因为这只奇怪的猫吃了我们的船而遭受数百美元的财产损失！
Texts.Eng: Squiggles came with us on our ship. SHE IS EATING EVERYTHING. Maple still adores the hell out of the little thing, but damn if we don't get hundreds in property damages from this weird cat eating our ship!

Texts.Chs: 今天，我和我的伙伴梅普尔发现了一个奇怪但可爱的小猫咪。我从来没有见过这样的东西，梅普尔坚持说这是一只猫。我是说，它看起来很像一只猫。它毛茸茸的，有点喵喵叫，它有四条腿，还有锋利的牙齿。只是...太胖了，嘴里还流着一些讨厌的金属液。让我的皮肤发痒。梅普尔决定给我们的新猫取名为“鬼画符”。
Texts.Eng: Today, my buddy Maple and I found a weird, but adorable little cat-thing. I've never seen anything like it, and Maple insists that it's a cat. I mean, it looks a lot like a cat. It's fluffy, it kinda meows, it has four legs, and it has sharp teeth. It's just... really fat, and drools some sort of nasty metal goo. Makes my skin itch. Maple decided to name our new cat ''Squiggles''.

Texts.Chs: 两个主妇讲述她们最新宠物的传奇。
Texts.Eng: Two wives tell the tale of their newest pet.

Texts.Chs: *我们绑架了一个降临者，而我妻子却叫它猫*
Texts.Eng: WE KIDNAPPED AN ALIEN AND MY WIFE CALLED IT A CAT
